id.comment: returns variable that is modified in a while loop with RHS pattern _s1+s4_

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; while w; Select v such that Modifies(a,v) such that Parent(w,a) pattern a (_, _"s1+s4"_)

id.comment: assignments that are in while loops and modifies a variable with z in RHS

query.querystr: assign a; while w; variable v; Select a such that Modifies(a, "e3") such that Parent*(w, a) pattern a(_, _"e4"_)

id.comment: returns while and assignments that are in while loops, which modifies a variable with pattern xyz + 123 in RHS

query.querystr: while w; assign a; variable v; Select <w,a> such that Parent*(w,a) such that Modifies(a,v) pattern a (_, _"s3+s4"_)

id.comment: variables in LHS of assignments that are in while loops

query.querystr: assign a; while w; variable v; Select v such that Modifies(a, v) such that Parent*(w, a)

id.comment: procedures that have an assignment in a while loop that has x in LHS

query.querystr: procedure p; assign a; while w; print pr; variable v; Select p such that Calls(p,"north") such that Uses(pr,v) pattern a ( "e5" , _)

id.comment: return variables that are read in procedures that calls south

query.querystr: procedure p; assign a; variable v; read r; Select v such that Calls*(p, "south") such that Modifies(r,v) such that Uses (p,v)

id.comment: returns while loops with an assignment with 1 in RHS that is in a while loop

query.querystr: assign a; while w; variable v; Select w pattern a (_,_"s3"_) such that Uses(w, "s1") such that Parent* (w, a)

id.comment: returns an assignment in a procedure in if loops that calls south uses the variable e4

query.querystr: procedure p; assign a; Select p such that Calls(p, "north") such that Uses(p, "e5")

id.comment: while loops which modifies s3 with an rhs with s3+s2

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; while w; Select w such that Parent*(w, a) such that Modifies(w,"s3") pattern a (_,_"s3+s2"_)

id.comment: Variable in RHS of assignments that are in if loops

query.querystr: variable v; if i; assign a; Select v such that Uses(a, v) such that Parent(i, a)

id.comment: return while loops that have assignments and modifies variables with n2 + n3 at rhs

query.querystr: assign a; while w; variable v; Select a such that Parent*(w,a) such that Modifies(w,v) pattern a (_,_"n2 + n3"_)

id.comment: return assignments and values that are in while loops with E in LHS

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; while w; Select <a,v> such that Modifies(a, v) such that Parent*(w, a) pattern a ("n4",_)
procedure p; while w; assign a; variable v; if i; Select <w,a> such that Parent*(w, a) such that Uses(w,"e1") pattern a ("e2",_)
